title: [1.3.2]OptiFine HD B2 Ultra for MC1.3.2 WuProem汉化版
author: WuProem
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuProem 于 2012-11-1 12:12 编辑 

译者动态
OptiFine 更新至 HD B3 Ultra ，我们论坛已有此版本汉化，本次不做汉化了。



版本信息OptiFine HD B2 Ultra for Minecraft 1.3.2
(该版本包含 标准版, 平滑版, 多核心版, AA版 高配置的所有功能)

选项“视频设置 -> 区块载入” 区块载入可在标准、平滑和多核心之间切换。当使用“区块载入: 多核心”请务必在显卡控制面板Disable“线程优化”/“OpenGL 线程”(例子)。在全局禁用它是为了获得最佳效果，不仅仅只是为了java.exe或minecraft.exe。

OptiFine 1.3.2_HD_U_B2(修正：随机怪物贴图，Forge的手持物品，AA/AF的手持表/指南针，ID和元数据的CTM检查，CTM对称 = ALL，CTM和侧边日志，与Forge的兼容性，向右对齐高清字体，垂直同步；已知的问题：距离渲染无效，不兼容Forge) 
Editions InformationOptiFine HD B2 Ultra for Minecraft 1.3.2
(has all the features of Standard, Smooth, Multi-Core and AA, highly configurable)

The option "Video Settings -> Chunk Loading" switches between Standard, Smooth and Multi-Core chunk loading. When using "Chunk Loading: Multi-Core" make sure to Disable "Threaded Optimization" / "OpenGL Threading"  in the graphics card control panel (example). For best results disable it globally, not only for java.exe or minecraft.exe.

OptiFine 1.3.2_HD_U_B2 (fixed: RandomMobs changing skins, handheld items with Forge, handheld watch/compass with AA/AF, CTM check by ID and metadata, CTM symmetry = all, CTM and sideways logs, Forge compatibility, right-aligned HD fonts, VSync; known problems: Extreme Render Distance inactive, not compatible with Forge) 


汉化版下载地址：
[1.3.2]OptiFine HD B2 Ultra 汉化版


鸣谢
白宝石汉化组的同志们
